item.title: The Hasso Plattner Institute is offering a free six-week MOOC on the Internet
item.description:
The Hasso Plattner Institute (HPI) is offering a free, six-week online course in English about the fundamentals of the Internet. Starting on March 31st, HPI’s director, Professor Christoph Meinel, will teach participants about the technical basis of the Internet through a massive open online course (MOOC) titled “Introduction to Internetworking with TCP/IP.” The course is available to anyone and can be accessed through free registration. Professor Meinel believes that anyone who uses the Internet for daily tasks like online shopping, reading news articles, or sending emails should understand the technologies that make these actions possible...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-hasso-plattner-institute-is-offering-a-free-six-week-mooc-on-the-internet/
